field.name: summary
field.value: LRUMap Collection is not correctly synchronized

field.name: description
field.value:
This property is not correctly synchronized: public override Object this[Object key]
Under a lot of load a racing condition will cause null values to be entered in the list. See this topic on the board: http://forum.castleproject.org/viewtopic.php?t=4089
The fix is trivial. Wrap the get method with a lock. See attached patch
